calc

Class Calculator<N extends java.lang.Number>

  • java.lang.Object
    • calc.Calculator<N>

  • public class Calculator<N extends java.lang.Number>
extends java.lang.Object
    Calculator Floating point calculator. The calculator is invoked through { @link #compute }. Note in order to make the calculator easily extensible towards other types, we use Float objects instead of float values for the computation. Likewise, operations on these objects are encapsulated by a class FloatOperations.
